code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer}
def maximum_score(nums, k)
    mod = 10**9 + 7

    # Helper function to calculate the prime score of a number
    def prime_score(n)
        return 0 if n < 2
        count = 0
        (2..Math.sqrt(n)).each do |i|
            if n % i == 0
                count += 1
                n /= i while n % i == 0
            end
        end
        count += 1 if n > 1
        count
    end

    # Calculate prime scores for all elements
    scores = nums.map { |num| [num, prime_score(num)] }

    # Sort by prime score and then by value descending
    scores.sort_by! { |num, score| [-score, -num] }

    result = 1
    scores.take(k).each { |num, score| result = (result * num) % mod }
    result
end
